gov.nasa.gsfc.nisgs.dsm
Class FtpMover

java.lang.Object
  gov.nasa.gsfc.nisgs.dsm.FileMover
      gov.nasa.gsfc.nisgs.dsm.FtpMover
Direct Known Subclasses:
FtpISReader, FtpISWriter
public abstract class FtpMover
extends FileMover

Abstract class that moves files between locations managed by the DSM using FTP. Implementing classes actually only move data to and from the IS.
